headline.0: Muslim Woman Sues Police For Forcing Her To Remove Hijab
headline.1: Businesses and Environmental Groups Call on President Obama to Create Clean 'Power India' Initiative
headline.2: Renewed U.S.-Cuba Relations: Saving American Lives and Limbs?

short_description.1: A "Power India" initiative would coordinate bilateral support from agencies such as the Overseas Private Investment Corporation (OPIC), U.S. Export-Import Bank, and USAID, with the goal of unlocking much needed support for clean energy projects and catalyzing the expansion of beyond-the-grid solar markets to help alleviate energy poverty.
short_description.2: Heberprot-P is proof that the U.S. embargo, still to be lifted by an act of Congress, isn't just hurting Cubans. American lives and limbs are also, quite literally, at stake.

authors.1: Vrinda Manglik, ContributorCampaign Representative, Sierra Club International Climate and...
authors.2: Gail Reed, ContributorExecutive Editor of MEDLINE-indexed MEDICC Review journal
